idenlight.title: IDEnlight
idenlight.shortDescription: IDEnlight is a project that I created as part of my Master's thesis. Its purpose is to learn about Self-Sovereign Identity and how to use verifiable credentials.

webxplorer.title: WebXplorerEDU
webxplorer.shortDescription: WebXplorerEDU is my YouTube channel where I upload educational videos about various web technologies, especially decentralized identity.

bib-desk.title: Bib-Desk
bib-desk.shortDescription: Bib-Desk is a desktop application for managing library data, including books, customers and loans.
